analysis.functional_summary: This JCL script is used to compile and link-edit a BMS map named BNK1CCM. It utilizes a procedure called MAPGEN and specifies a member BNK1CCM with a relocation mode of ANY. The output is directed to a specified location or system output.
data_flow: Step 2: Compilation of BMS map using MAPGEN procedure
Step 3: Link-editing of the compiled map
state_changes: Link-edited output stored in specified output location
side_effects: Utilizes system resources for compilation and link-editing
interface_points: JCLLIB ORDER directive for library access
INCLUDE MEMBER directive for default settings
performance_characteristics: Performance depends on system resources during compilation and link-editing
error_handling: Standard JCL error handling for compilation and link-editing failures
modernization_notes: Consider refactoring JCL to use modern build tools
Evaluate potential for automation using CI/CD pipelines
analysis.analysis_notes: The JCL script is straightforward with minimal complexity, primarily serving as a build script for a specific BMS map.
